name: Wizard Fish
description:
You are a wizard fish, The last of your kind who knows the ancient secrets of the arcane. You are now hunted by pirates, the undead, mermaids, and more! How long can you survive?

This game was submitted to Miz Jam 1. Wizard Fish is an endless sidescroller with multiple weapons, enemies, a local leaderboard, and a day night cycle with unique foes. Recommended to play in full screen

Created by Aidan, Bar, and Will.

Music from: 

  • https://www.youtube.com/user/teknoaxe
  • https://www.youtube.com/user/EvanKingAudio

Sounds from: https://www.zapsplat.com/

Dev logs: https://www.youtube.com/user/anuytre6578/videos?view_as=subscriber

This game uses the Kenney 1-Bit Art Pack!

 https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
